title: unexpected fault
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.10.8-stable
OS & Version: Ubuntu Linux, 20.04 LTS
Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
Geth fast syncs without error

#### Actual behaviour
While attempting to fast sync a fatal error is thrown and geth exits

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I'd been running a node for a while but stopped a few months back.  Yesterday I upgraded to from 1.10.5 to 1.10.7 and started geth. While syncing a fatal error was thrown.  I ran `removedb` and answered Y to all questions and then tried to full re-sync, but the same error was eventually thrown.  This morning I upgraded to 1.10.8 and tried to sync, same error.
